title: How to write fast without a bad handwriting - Quora

response.answer_text: Practice. Write fast and write often. Avoid using the notes app on your phone when you can use a notepad. You’ll get better at writing neat.

For me it depends on the pen. Some pens grip the paper better and give me more control while others are slippery and make me write worse. You could also pick a handwriting that you tink looks nice and practice it for a while. Then when you think you have it good, try and write in it over and over again and eventually you will be able to speed up the process.
